OrgMetricScanSummary.name: OrgMetricScanSummary
OrgMetricScanSummary.description: Represents the results summary for a specific feature in a Salesforce Optimizer evaluation.

ErrorMessage.description: The message returned if an error occurred during the most recent Optimizer evaluation.

FeatureLimit.description: The numerical limit of a feature.

ImplementationEffort.description: The estimated time needed to complete the recommended actions for the feature.

ItemCount.description: The number of issues found for the feature. Corresponds to the number of OrgMetricScanResult objects generated for the feature in an Optimizer evaluation.

Name.description: A number that identifies the feature’s results summary.

OrgMetricId.description: The OrgMetric ID that represents the feature analyzed in the Optimizer evaluation.

PercentUsage.description: A percentage associated with a feature.

ScanDate.description: The time that the report for the Optimizer evaluation was generated.

Status.description: The recommended action for the feature.

Unit.description: The unit of measurement used in the feature’s results summary.
